Springfield, Ohio, United States1 contribution
They will fraudulently charge your card.
Mar 2024 • Family
Mason location charges $15 a day parking. Handicap parking also. Even when you booked before this policy went into effect and did not agree to these terms in your booking. Even when the lodge tells you they will waive it they will still fraudulently charge your card and refuse to refund it. They don’t do what they say they will do and don’t actually care about their customers. It’s all about money. We will not be returning because of this. A $15 parking fee is a weird hill for them to die on but it’s killed it for our family.
Written April 6, 2024
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
C D
1 contribution
Great Wolf Lodge Ohio - NOT RECOMMENDED
Mar 2024 • Family
Expectations NOT met - Great Wolf Ohio
1- half of group arrived at 8pm - activity in lobby was wall to wall people. No pathway to push luggage carts through crowd to reach elevators . I asked reception desk staff to assist in clearing a path ,as concern to injure guests sitting on floor or child running. She said “she could not help” . I asked how she suggested we get to our paid rooms ? She simply turned away and returned to the desk. WOW !
2- Build a bear store with four children . All chose a wolf. The staff helping to build was very kind and sweet with kids. The lineup was out the door as she finished our 4. She called for help -and told us “no one answers phone”. We then lined up at cash register but she was building bears with others - she called again and supervisor “Alaina” came to cash guests out. Posted on the cash register was an offer for 25% off. I asked Alaina to offer us this and she stated “that should not be there” . I voiced my concern that was NOT a fair statement - I felt I should be entitled to a posted offer. She said she would “try” to credit my room. No surprise -check out bill did not include any credit for 25% reduction. As we left store she removed the posted offer from cash register.WOW!
3- Bowling activity was fun for kids. The issue was the benches -we were unable to sit down as fabric (vinyl ) was shredded/ripped /torn. How can this situation not be resolved ? Clearly maintenance is not a priority - charging for highly priced game of bowling is. WOW!
4- Check out time is 11am . AT 1059am they are knocking on doors to remind you . WE exited at 11am and hallway was filled with cleaning cart staff & carts. SO the question is -if rooms are cleaned at 11am (on arrival day -we arrived at 10am as we were told our room MAY be ready & water park was open for use)we waited until 2pm for text to state our room was available? Some room clearly are available earlier in day -why not offer this early access? Locker fee was $14.and we were lucky to find one available. Also NO safes in the room. WOW!
5- Water park sitting is limited - guests arrive at opening and put towels on chairs and swim all day -inconsiderate of those not swimming.No staff in pool area to assist with seating or locker rental -I had an issue and I asked the swim supply store staff to help me (although she admitted she knew nothing about process to rent a locker).
We witnessed two “mock drownings”. One was a guest ( employee) struggles to breath at exit of slide - life guard jumps in to assist -then we see 2 men in suits - congratulate life guard . Later that day we are watching our kids exit the 2 largest slides (double tubes) then we see lifeguard jump into water and pulls a child sized mannequin complete with hair and bathing suit from bottom of pool at base of slide- another heart stopping moment for all guests observing this “mock drowning”. Why not post warnings for guests informing all of “mock drownings” .possibility ?this was very unsettling .WOW!
6-positive note- breakfast buffet serves a huge amount of food with fast service. Cassidy was an outstanding server.
My review was sent with checkout survey - a director contacted me the same day with her “deep regrets “and her need to “discuss my experience”. I provided a day & time to connect as she requested- that was 3 days ago -she did not follow up as promised . Who’s surprised ? WOW!
Written March 21, 2024
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Tricia A
1 contribution
isappointing Experience at Great Wolf Lodge Sandusky, Ohio
Feb 2024 • Family
My recent stay at Great Wolf Lodge in Sandusky, Ohio, left much to be desired. Despite the hotel being sold out, it was severely understaffed in every service department, leading to significant delays and a lack of attention to detail throughout my visit.

Upon entering my hotel room, I was greeted with disappointment. The cleanliness of the room was subpar, with mold evident on the ceilings and floors of the bathroom. This is simply unacceptable for a hotel of this caliber.

The pool area was overcrowded and lacked sufficient seating, making it difficult to enjoy the amenities. The fast-food service was equally disappointing, with frozen food and stale chips being served, and the mobile ordering system failing to function properly.

Dining experiences were also disappointing. Despite being told there would be a 30-minute wait, I waited over two hours for a table, only to be informed that the kitchen was too backed up, and I was advised to seek food elsewhere. The breakfast the following day was marred by poor service, with waitstaff unable to manage their tables effectively and a lack of drink refills.

Although the entertainment staff did an admirable job of entertaining the children, it did little to make up for the overall disappointing experience.

In conclusion, I am disappointed by the lack of quality and service provided during my two-night stay in a loft fireplace suite. Considering the prices charged, which rival those of Disney World, I expected much more. I hope that management takes this feedback seriously and implements changes to improve the overall guest experience at this location.
Written February 20, 2024
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

They do not care for the health of your kids but how much money they can rip you off
Jan 2024 • Family
We reserved the day pass and 2 days before half of the group got covid, so we called in to cancel. But we were denied. the agent said we do not refund or cancel the day pass. so i said half the group half corona virus do you want us to go to a place that is full of kids and family members while sick. The agent replied sir I cannot refund you the money and i cannot tell you what to do. but we can reschedule. I said i do not know when is the next kids vacation and when our group can get together again. To make story short the agent did not care if we get the whole city infected with corona or not, she cared more about not refunding us any penny and she was proud of that.
Written January 4, 2024

Ohio1 contribution
More money for less
Nov 2023 • Family
We have been coming here for 7 years with the grandkids for Thanksgiving. The 1st year they had a great Thanksgiving buffet. The next year the buffet was awful. Every year after it was not as clean as the year before. Then they stopped the buffet. Food was fair but over priced. Now it's 2023 Thanksgiving and the games in game room are expensive and to hard for the kids. The hot tubs were separated, 1 for kids and 1 for adults, not anymore. They even stopped the water jets in the hot tubs. The clock tower is gone. No benches or seats in the lobby by the fireplace. This will be our last time here.
Written November 24, 2023
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Ashley E
1 contribution
Take your business elsewhere
Nov 2023 • Family
DO NOT GO TO THIS LOCATION...
****BEDBUGS****

My family and I stayed here for the weekend and just got back home this Sunday. I noticed I had a sort of rash. Which I just thought maybe from all the chlorine I had just indulged in. Turns out they are bedbug bites! I'm mortified and afraid I've brought them home with us. Although very thankful that none of the children have bites. I would have never thought this place would have them. The amount of money families pay to have fun with thier loved ones you would think they'd use some of that revenue to properly care for the rooms in thier lodge.

Our first time was wonderful. The children had a fabulous time and wore my husband and I out. Room was clean, and service was great. Incidentals return hit our account in a reasonable time frame. As for this time my account was over charged and the incidentals deposit has yet to been credited back into my account. When talking to thier 1-800 representative he said it can take up to 7-10 days to hit. The gentleman didn't seem too bothered or surprised about the bug bites I contracted from the lodge. I was told someone would call in 72 hours and if they didn't call that number back. Something tells me I will be calling and doing the same conversation over again with nothing solved.

Take your family's elsewhere not here.
Written November 23, 2023
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
superuufy
4 contributions
Not as good as it used to be
Nov 2023 • Family
We just wrapped our third annual trip to GWF with our now-5 year old son. Check in was smooth, room was fine and water park was just as fun as ever. Happy with the food quality at both the restaurant and the pizza shop. Yes, the food was a bit pricier then you’d pay at an offsite restaurant but that’s to be expected for an on-property meal.

The cons…

1. Restaurant was very chilly. We asked to for them to turn up the temp but it didn’t help much.
2. No tables in the lobby. This has always been the case and an ongoing pet peeve. It would be really nice to sit at a proper table and have a snack, pizza, coffee or whatever instead of eating at a bench or taking it back to the room.
3. Pizza shop makes you order at the kiosk, even when the employees are RIGHT BEHIND THE COUNTER. I hate that.
4. Wi-Fi is SO SLOW! It’s important for me to catch up on work in the evening after the family is in bed but I could never get a good connection. This is 2023, folks. You can do better.
5. Housekeeping? Not really. Someone apparently came by and tossed the sheets back on the bed and gave us fresh towels, but that was it.
6. Kids’ activities—All seemed rushed. I remember before that a lot of the activities would run for 30 minutes but now it’s all 15 minutes. That’s too short, ending just as my son was getting into it. And the girl calling out bingo numbers—SLOW DOWN! I’m in my 40s and can barely keep up with you. How do you expect the kids to follow along? And 15 minutes is totally not long enough for that game. Kids want to play and get to be winners.
7. MagiQuest had too many glitches and quests not working right. For what we pay this shouldn’t be an issue.
8. We miss the clocktower. I don’t know why it was removed and we were really disappointed that it was gone. Our son loved the clocktower show.

Despite the negatives we still had a good time, but not as good as before.
Written November 3, 2023
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Lauren B
1 contribution
Overpriced and RUDE.
Oct 2023 • Family
Don’t waste your money. We spent over $400 for a room and paid an extra $80 the next day for later checkout and so our kids could have more time at the water park however we’re told they weren’t allowed in the park because they didn’t have wristbands on. Mind you we swam the entire day before and had no wristbands and they even looked at my kids wrist to put on bands to tell them their height and said absolutely nothing. We wasted an entire hour trying to get wristbands because we were due to check out in an hour and on top of all of that I had already taken my band off and went to grab my kids out of the water park (they were swimming with their aunt and uncle so we could load the car) AND THEY WOULDN’T LET ME IN TO GET MY KIDS. It was the same lady who told me my kids weren’t allowed in who just saw the wrist band on my wrist 40 min prior to me coming back in to get my kids. I had no bath in suit on I’m in a hoody and leggings and they wouldn’t even let me in the park to grab my kids. I will NEVER be back. They are rude, overpriced and I wouldn’t spend a dime here. I promise save your money and go elsewhere you’ll be happier in the end.
Written October 16, 2023
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Complaint
Aug 2023 • Friends
I went with my freinds last week for my freinds fourtenth birthday when we got there our room wasn’t ready which is stupid and then the water park was terrible barely any slides the hot tubs were disgusting and aside from that I couldn’t buy myself a first time being at great wolf lodge souvenir because all they took was card or off of your wristband so I couldn’t buy anything because my freinds moms card was connected to the wristbands the food is way to overpriced and anytime me and my freinds would go down to bigbys there staff was rude alongside that only thing we could do was the water park because the staff said they didn’t have any more wolf passes which was a lie we only got half of a refund for our cabana so my freinds birthday was ruined and the staff made her cry because they yelled at her so great wolf lodge staff and in general employees do better I know for a fact that for my fourteenth birthday we will be going to either the great wolf lodge in traverse city or kalahari because you guys could do way better so when you guys get better staff and renovate your water park and make the food cheaper and things actually buyable we will consider coming back and also bad idea with the show in the main lobby creepy ass dolls you guys have
Written August 19, 2023
